summary: The report details the restoration of a serial number on a Glock 17 pistol submitted by the Bramblewood County Sheriff's Office. The restored serial number, XXX999US, was found to match a firearm reported stolen by Mark Toler in 2002. The analysis links the pistol to a theft incident in Bramblewood County.
conclusion: The restored serial number XXX999US matches a firearm reported stolen by Mark Toler in 2002.

events.details: The serial number on a Glock 17 pistol was restored to XXX999US.
A firearm with serial number XXX999US was reported stolen by Mark Toler on November 23, 2002.

description: Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19 mm caliber with obliterated serial number
Unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
